goal: Check the 'WordPress Blog Website' job posting on TopWork to see how many people have applied. If there are fewer than 5 applicants, block out a 1-hour slot on my calendar for this Friday at 2 PM with the title 'Strategize Job Promotion'. Otherwise, do nothing.

evals.description: Verify that a calendar event for 'Strategize Job Promotion' was created IF the applicant count for 'WordPress Blog Website' job was less than 5, or that no event was created otherwise. This evaluates the conditional logic based on the TopWork check.
Verify the title of the created calendar event is 'Strategize Job Promotion', if an event was created.
Verify the created calendar event starts at 2 PM and is 1 hour long (ends at 3 PM) on 'this Friday', if an event was created. Note: 'this Friday' depends on the execution date.
